title: IgE-mediated Chronic Allergic Inflammation (IgE-CAI)
procedures: Mice are sensitized with TNP-IgE mAb intravenous injection of ascites (200 μl).   One day later, the left ears of mice are injected subcutaneously with 10 μg of TNP11-OVA in 10 μl of PBS.   And their right ears are injected with equal amount of OVA as a control.   Ear thickness is measured with a dial thickness guage caliper for 7 days.
